content: The Loong Scales are tucked away in an area that's so easy to miss. You have to crack a wall in the First Prince of Flowing Sands boss room to get any idea they exist and it's not obvious that you can do this whatsoever. Either bait the boss to smash the wall for you or use powerful attacks from Azure Dust (if you finished the Man-in-Stone Questline) or Wandering Wight to split the wall.
